#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <deque>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <utility>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cctype>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;

#define M 10000000
#define MOD 10007

static bool prime[M+1];
static int pcount[M+1];
static int pc;

void sieve() {
  for (int pn = 2; pn * pn <= M; pn++)
    if (!prime[pn])
      for (int p = pn * pn; p <= M; p += pn)
	prime[p] = true;
}

int power(int n) {
  if (n == 0) return 1;
  int p = 1, b = 2;
  while (n) {
    if (n & 1)
      p *= b;
    p %= MOD;
    n >>= 1;
    b = (b*b) % MOD;
  }
  return p;
}

int main()
{
  sieve();
  for (int i = 2; i <= M; i++) {
    if (!prime[i]) pc++;
    pcount[i] = pc;
  }

  int n;
  while (scanf("%d", &n) == 1) {
    if (n == 1) cout << 0 << endl;
    else printf("%d\n", power(pcount[n]-1));
  }

  return 0;
}
